# Summary
This project attempt to visualize the data from General Statistics Office of Vietnam into Vietnam map interactively\
The statistic data come from the official [website](https://www.gso.gov.vn)\
The map data come from Raster through R package `raster`\

```{r}
source(here("final-result/function/map-ggplotly.r"))
ggplotly_population_vn()
```
